name: Word Warriors - Realtime Online Word Battles for 2 Players
name_original: Word Warriors - Realtime Online Word Battles for 2 Players
description:
COMPETE 1-ON-1 IN REALTIME

Take on the world in 1-vs-1 word battles to win trophies and exclusive prizes!

Who can find the most words in 60 seconds?!


PLAY FOR WORD COINS AND EXCLUSIVE ITEMS

In every competitive 1-vs-1 match you play, there’ll be Word Coins at stake – win the match and the Coins are yours. You can use these to enter higher ranked matches with bigger stakes, or to buy new items in the Shop.

LEVEL UP

Word Warriors’s level system means you’re always facing a challenge. Play matches to increase your ranking and get access to more exclusive match locations, where you play against only the best Word Warriors.


Just swipe your finger across the board! Its easy, fast and addictive!

- Level up to play in different cities!
- Challenge people from all over the world!
- Unlock hidden bonuses!
- Spin the board for a fresh look at the letters!
- Track your stats

Prepare to become a true Word Warrior!
